summary: Innovative software engineer with 8+ years of experience developing scalable web applications. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams and delivering high-impact solutions that increased user engagement by 45% and reduced system downtime by 60%.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer

achievements: Architected and implemented scalable API gateway reducing response times by 40%
Led team of 6 engineers in migrating legacy systems to cloud-native infrastructure
Implemented automated testing pipelines increasing deployment confidence by 85%

achievements: Built machine learning pipeline increasing prediction accuracy by 35%
Optimized database queries reducing processing time from hours to minutes
Mentored 3 junior developers and established code review best practices

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Full-stack development for e-commerce platform serving 500K+ customers
achievements: Developed responsive web application using React and Node.js
Implemented payment processing system handling $2M+ monthly transactions
Created automated deployment system reducing release time by 70%
